name: Weezard
description:
PRESS "P" FOR FULLSCREEN

You are an old man that just recently found out that he's a wizard and the only spell you know allows you to change your weight at will.

A & D / LEFT & RIGHT arrows to move;

Space to jump;

W & S / UP & DOWN arrows to change weight;

Q & E to achieve minimum / maximum weight (available at 100 wisdom)
